channel.title: Enterprise on KrakenD - Ultra-High performance API Gateway with middlewares
channel.description: Recent content in Enterprise on KrakenD - Ultra-High performance API Gateway with middlewares

item.title: Open sourcing all enterprise components
item.description: What are known today as the KrakenD Enterprise components will be disclosed in the form of open source repositories in the following weeks, and the action has already started, don’t miss it! In this post we will explain the reasons behind this decision that might sound crazy from a business perspective in the first place. Why anyone would publish the paid software increment bits of an existing free software?
